name: 3D Dark-Stalker Destruction Simulator PC
description:
I present to your attention a Unique Simulator of destruction. Huge arsenal and interesting gameplay. Relieve stress in the sandbox!

- A rich arsenal of various weapons from AK to RPG

- Realistic physics of destruction

- Ragdoll models

- 10 Unique Locations for Experiments

- Beautiful graphics

- High quality sound

-Unity engine

-Zombie Mode
